lines.text: I'll take turrrrkey with all the trrrrrrrrrrrrrrrimmings!

[after sky-writing "Warner Bros." with a cigarette]
Just giving my bosses a plug. I've got an option coming up.
This should be a close-up, am I r-r-r-r-r-right, boys?
Yes, sir, yes, sir, yes, sir, yes, sir!

[reacting to Daffy's "film"]
Amazing! Marvelous! Stupendous! Colossal! Tremendous! Gigantic! Astounding! Unbelievable! Spectacular! Phenomenal! And it's good, too.

[after Daffy replaces the film in the camera with bullets]
This isn't a gangster-r-r pictur-r-r-r-r-r-r-re!

[in Daffy's newsreel film]
Motion pictures... are... your best... entertainment.

[in Daffy's newsreel as the winner of the beauty contest]
I'm happy all over. Thank you.
Hello, Miss Morgan, get me director Von Hamburger on the wire. Hello, Von Hamburger?
[pan to side revealing Von Hamburger standing right next to I.M., talking on the phone]
...it better be good and you better finish it today or else.
Yes, sir-r-r-r-r-r-r-r. I'll r-r-r-rush it thr-r-r-r-rough r-r-r-r-r-r-r-r-r-r-r-r-r-right away!
